suggestions.name: Tuna Avocado Wrap
suggestions.description: A quick and nutritious wrap filled with tuna, avocado, and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Drain the canned tuna and place in a bowl
Slice the avocado and mash half of it with the tuna
Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper to the tuna mixture
Lay out the tortilla and spread the tuna mixture in the center
Top with lettuce, sliced tomato, and remaining avocado slices
Fold in the sides of the tortilla and roll up tightly
Cut in half diagonally if desired

suggestions.name: Quinoa Chickpea Bowl
suggestions.description: A hearty vegetarian bowl with protein-rich quinoa and chickpeas, perfect for a quick lunch.
instructions: Rinse and drain the chickpeas
Slice the cherry tomatoes in half
Dice the cucumber into small pieces
In a bowl, combine the cooked quinoa and chickpeas
Add the tomatoes and cucumber
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine

suggestions.name: Egg and Vegetable Stir-Fry
suggestions.description: A quick and protein-packed stir-fry using eggs and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat
Dice the onion and bell pepper, mince the garlic
Saut√© the onion and garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute
Add the bell pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened
Add the spinach and cook until wilted
Beat the eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper
Pour the eggs into the pan and scramble with the vegetables
Drizzle with soy sauce and mix well
Serve hot over cooked brown rice
